schema:applicationCategory.rdfs:comment: Type of software application, e.g. 'Game, Multimedia'.
schema:applicationCategory.rdfs:label: applicationCategory

schema:applicationSubCategory.rdfs:comment: Subcategory of the application, e.g. 'Arcade Game'.
schema:applicationSubCategory.rdfs:label: applicationSubCategory

schema:applicationSuite.rdfs:comment: The name of the application suite to which the application belongs (e.g. Excel belongs to Office).
schema:applicationSuite.rdfs:label: applicationSuite

schema:availableOnDevice.rdfs:comment: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.
schema:availableOnDevice.rdfs:label: availableOnDevice

schema:countriesNotSupported.rdfs:comment: Countries for which the application is not supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
schema:countriesNotSupported.rdfs:label: countriesNotSupported

schema:countriesSupported.rdfs:comment: Countries for which the application is supported. You can also provide the two-letter ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code.
schema:countriesSupported.rdfs:label: countriesSupported

schema:device.rdfs:comment: Device required to run the application. Used in cases where a specific make/model is required to run the application.
schema:device.rdfs:label: device

schema:downloadUrl.rdfs:comment: If the file can be downloaded, URL to download the binary.
schema:downloadUrl.rdfs:label: downloadUrl

schema:featureList.rdfs:comment: Features or modules provided by this application (and possibly required by other applications).
schema:featureList.rdfs:label: featureList

schema:fileSize.rdfs:comment: Size of the application / package (e.g. 18MB). In the absence of a unit (MB, KB etc.), KB will be assumed.
schema:fileSize.rdfs:label: fileSize

schema:installUrl.rdfs:comment: URL at which the app may be installed, if different from the URL of the item.
schema:installUrl.rdfs:label: installUrl

schema:permissions.rdfs:comment: Permission(s) required to run the app (for example, a mobile app may require full internet access or may run only on wifi).
schema:permissions.rdfs:label: permissions

schema:processorRequirements.rdfs:comment: Processor architecture required to run the application (e.g. IA64).
schema:processorRequirements.rdfs:label: processorRequirements

schema:releaseNotes.rdfs:comment: Description of what changed in this version.
schema:releaseNotes.rdfs:label: releaseNotes

schema:requirements.rdfs:comment: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
schema:requirements.rdfs:label: requirements

schema:screenshot.rdfs:comment: A link to a screenshot image of the app.
schema:screenshot.rdfs:label: screenshot

schema:softwareAddOn.rdfs:comment: Additional content for a software application.
schema:softwareAddOn.rdfs:label: softwareAddOn

schema:softwareRequirements.rdfs:comment: Component dependency requirements for application. This includes runtime environments and shared libraries that are not included in the application distribution package, but required to run the application (Examples: DirectX, Java or .NET runtime).
schema:softwareRequirements.rdfs:label: softwareRequirements
